dublin_core_terms.accessRights: Information about who can access the resource or an indication of its security status.
dublin_core_terms.accrualMethod: The method by which items are added to a collection.
dublin_core_terms.accrualPeriodicity: The frequency with which items are added to a collection.
dublin_core_terms.accrualPolicy: The policy governing the addition of items to a collection.
dublin_core_terms.alternative: An alternative name for the resource.
dublin_core_terms.audience: A class of entity for whom the resource is intended or useful.
dublin_core_terms.available: Date that the resource became or will become available.
dublin_core_terms.bibliographicCitation: A bibliographic reference for the resource.
dublin_core_terms.conformsTo: An established standard to which the resource conforms.
dublin_core_terms.contributor: An entity responsible for making contributions to the resource.
dublin_core_terms.coverage: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, spatial applicability, or jurisdiction.
dublin_core_terms.created: Date of creation of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.creator: An entity primarily responsible for making the resource.
dublin_core_terms.date: A point or period of time associated with an event in the lifecycle of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.dateAccepted: Date of acceptance of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.dateCopyrighted: Date of copyright for the resource.
dublin_core_terms.dateSubmitted: Date of submission of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.educationLevel: A class of entity, defined in terms of progression through an educational or training context, for which the resource is intended.
dublin_core_terms.extent: The size or duration of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.format: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.hasFormat: A related resource that is substantially the same as the described resource, but in another format.
dublin_core_terms.hasPart: A related resource that is included either physically or logically in the described resource.
dublin_core_terms.hasVersion: A related resource that is a version, edition, or adaptation of the described resource.
dublin_core_terms.identifier: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.
dublin_core_terms.instructionalMethod: A process, used to engender knowledge, attitudes, and skills, that the resource is designed to support.
dublin_core_terms.isFormatOf: A related resource that is substantially the same as the described resource, but in another format.
dublin_core_terms.isPartOf: A related resource in which the described resource is physically or logically included.
dublin_core_terms.isReferencedBy: A related resource that references, cites, or otherwise points to the described resource.
dublin_core_terms.isReplacedBy: A related resource that supplants, displaces, or supersedes the described resource.
dublin_core_terms.isRequiredBy: A related resource that requires the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.
dublin_core_terms.issued: Date of formal issuance of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.isVersionOf: A related resource of which the described resource is a version, edition, or adaptation.
dublin_core_terms.license: A legal document giving official permission to do something with the resource.
dublin_core_terms.mediator: An entity that mediates access to the resource.
dublin_core_terms.medium: The material or physical carrier of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.modified: Date on which the resource was changed.
dublin_core_terms.provenance: A statement of any changes in ownership and custody of the resource since its creation.
dublin_core_terms.publisher: An entity responsible for making the resource available.
dublin_core_terms.references: A related resource that is referenced, cited, or otherwise pointed to by the described resource.
dublin_core_terms.replaces: A related resource that is supplanted, displaced, or superseded by the described resource.
dublin_core_terms.requires: A related resource that is required by the described resource to support its function, delivery, or coherence.
dublin_core_terms.rights: Information about rights held in and over the resource.
dublin_core_terms.rightsHolder: A person or organization owning or managing rights over the resource.
dublin_core_terms.source: A related resource from which the described resource is derived.
dublin_core_terms.subject: The topic of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.tableOfContents: A list of subunits of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.title: A name given to the resource.
dublin_core_terms.type: The nature or genre of the resource.
dublin_core_terms.valid: Date (often a range) of validity of a resource.

dublin_core_elements_1_1.format: The file format, physical medium, or dimensions of the resource.
dublin_core_elements_1_1.identifier: An unambiguous reference to the resource within a given context.

dublin_core_elements_1_1.rights: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

dublin_core_elements_1_1.subject: The topic of the resource.

dublin_core_elements_1_1.type: The nature or genre of the resource.
